products.title: Tiny Rainbows Candy Roman Blind
products.description: What a beautiful way to dress your little ones window. This cutely stylish blind features some of their favourite kid-friendly elements - vibrant colours, simple shapes and bright purity. The joyful little hand-drawn rainbows scattered across the clean white fabric burst with s what a beautiful way to dress your little ones window.

products.title: Horizon Golden Sand Roman Blind
products.description: A gorgeous sunny blend of golden neutrals makes this horizon blind really stand out from the crowd. The graduated ombre print creates a border pattern at the bottom of the fabric that's incredibly modern and on trend. The subtle use of colour allows you to incorporate this blind a gorgeous sunny blend of golden neutrals makes this horizon blind really stand out from the crowd.

products.title: Horizon Atlantic Roman Blind
products.description: Cool calm and collected, this horizon atlantic roman blind is a contemporary classic. A graduated ombre pattern of watercolour blues creates a beautiful border across the bottom of the fabric. It's a great way of adding a drop of colour to your decor and will complement other blu cool calm and collected, this horizon atlantic roman blind is a contemporary classic.

products.title: Twinkling Stars Cream Roman Blind
products.description: Light and bright in both fabric and design, this little beauty balances cool, icy style with cosy warmth expertly to create a vibe thats both stylish and snuggly. The twinkling star pattern, when set against the light, creamy shade of this fabric, takes on a different look al light and bright in both fabric and design, this little beauty balances cool, icy style with cosy warmth expertly to create a vibe thats both stylish and snuggly.

products.description: If the ideal window dressing for your little one combines luxury and playfulness, then this is the perfect blind for you.
